bug.short_desc: [1.8][compiler][codegen] Generate code for enclosing instance capture in lambda methods

long_desc.thetext:
BETA_JAVA8:
This is spawned by splitting Bug 405068. I'll retain that bug for capture of locals from enclosing context and use the present one for enclosing instance capture as these two topics are unconnected and involve altogether different implementation concerns.
When this is resolved, we should also reenable the tests disabled via: eclipse.org/c/jdt/eclipse.jdt.core.git/commit/?h=BETA_JAVA8&id=92dfd6c989831ab263c5667f92428e6c9943c027

Test and fix released here: http://git.eclipse.org/c/jdt/eclipse.jdt.core.git/commit/?h=BETA_JAVA8&id=1b53a525120894192853120c7678edb264d25490
All the tests mentioned in comment#0 as being disabled are enabled back now.
I'll follow up with some more tests, but this bug is essentially fixed and ready to be resolved.
